feed.title: blog about R [and other stuff]
feed.subtitle: This site is used to keep track of the things that keep me busy, which mainly involves R related stuff. You will find things like data visualization, (shiny) applications and reporting.

entry.title: First post!
entry.content: So this is my first post. It’s kinda boring because it is only intended to see if everything works and I understand a little bit how jekyll does it’s magic. Hopefully future posts will be a bit more exciting :)
